reviews.name: SOG SlimJim Tanto Folding Knife
reviews.reviewText: Even though it is suppose to be a spring assisted open blade, there was not enough spring action to completely open and lock the blade in place. Not sure if it was due to a lack of "power" or the locking mechanism was to strong. Preventing the blade from fully opening and locking. Expected more from a SOG. Returned it.
reviews.title: Blade would not lock open

reviews.name: SOG SlimJim Tanto Folding Knife
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the best knifes that I have ever owned
reviews.title: great overall knife

reviews.name: SOG SlimJim Tanto Folding Knife
reviews.reviewText: the lock on the knife that locks the blade into the handle while it's in your pocket is stiff and hard to lock and unlock. at times the lock will dissengauge when putting it in your pocket.
reviews.title: spring asisisted spring broke on mine after 3 week

reviews.name: SOG SlimJim Tanto Folding Knife
reviews.reviewText: Got this knife as a gift. Love how it fits in my pocket.
reviews.title: slimjim

reviews.name: SOG SlimJim Tanto Folding Knife
reviews.reviewText: I bought this knife a few weeks ago. The lock was very stiff when I first got it. I love it now. It's a perfect every day knife
reviews.title: Great knife
